title: Client needs to stop changing my settings.
body: I know my laptop is bad it's not bad enough the client needs to keep rechecking the "Close client during game" option. I average 35fps in the game with the client open, thus it does not need to be enabled. It's either I recheck it every 2-3 times I login or finish a game and wait for the client to restart....

replies.body:
It sounds like something could be up with your config files, so it's not syncing up and saving to our servers.  Try a config reset to see if that will help your options stick.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

I hope that helps!
So I did that and it was fine for about a 1 1/2 days. Started doing it again yesterday evening and twice today so far.
